# maximumNumberOfResults

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of reservation results to return.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var maximumNumberOfResults: NSNumber? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When building the list of reservation time slots, limit the number of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRestaurantReservationBooking] objects you create to the number in this property.

## Getting the Time Slot Constraints

- **earliestBookingDateForResults**: The earliest date for which to return results.
- **latestBookingDateForResults**: The latest date for which to return results.
